scenario_text.value:
(We hurried to the amusement park to gain
some of Jijimon’s wisdom...)
(And yet...)

Huh... What is this? We came all this way,
but nobody’s home.
Weird... They always come out to greet us...

If that rowdy bunch ain’t around, maybe
something happened to them?

If so...then it was something unpleasant, to
be sure.
This is weird. I don’t hear a thing...
There’s something spooky going on here...
Stay alert, everyone!

Heyyy, Jijimooon!
Can you hear us?!
No response...

At the very least, he doesn’t seem to be in
hearing range.

...Careful, Takuma. Something feels kind of
off around here.

Something’s nearby. Not Jijimon or the
others...something different.
Different...?
Hey! Everyone, come here!
Saki? What is it?!
These little guys are hurt!
Oh, it’s them...
Arrrgh...

Hey! Hang in there, guy! What happened to
you?!

A, a human girl came outta nowhere...and
attacked us...with a buncha fog monsters...
A human girl...Miyuki?!

Jijimon and our friends who aren’t hurt...are
holed up...in the throne room...

Those monsters let up for now, but...they’ll
be back...to attack...again...

Yo, hold it together! Tell us, where is the
enemy now?!

That’s enough, Kaito!
Don’t force them to speak through pain!

(Miyuki attacked this place? But why? Did she
predict what we were going to do?)
Takuma!!!
What, did something happen?!
The way to the throne room is blocked off!

This can’t be happening...!
What’re we gonna do?!

Calm down, please. The ones hiding within
likely blocked this way when they fled.

So it’s basically a siege situation, right?
If so, it’s possible that they’re all safe.
I wonder if we can buy some more time?

Miu, gather all of the injured around here.
Then we’ll meet up with <color=#B41919>Jijimon</color>!
Uh, yeah. You got it!
All right, we’d better get looking ourselves.
